name: Revenue Management Specialist
description:

  • Ad hoc tasks relevant to the Revenue Management team requirements;
  • Support on long-term revenue management planning for flight plan period;
  • Reach goals and benchmarks in order to demonstrate effective performance;
  • Analyzing daily reports for every assigned route;
  • The general prospective of job functions.
